effect_entries.effect:
Used in battle
:   Catches a wild Pokémon without fail.

    If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
effect_entries.short_effect: Catches a wild Pokémon every time.

effect_entries.effect:
Used in battle
:   Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon, using a catch rate of 2×.

    If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
effect_entries.short_effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Success rate is 2×.

effect_entries.effect:
Used in battle
:   Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon, using a catch rate of 1.5×.

    If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
effect_entries.short_effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Success rate is 1.5×.

effect_entries.effect:
Used in battle
:   Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon, using a catch rate of 1×.

    If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
effect_entries.short_effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.

effect_entries.effect:
Used in battle
:   Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon, using a catch rate of 1.5×.

This item can only be used in the great marsh or kanto safari zone.
effect_entries.short_effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon in the Great Marsh or Safari Zone.  Success rate is 1.5×.

effect_entries.effect:
Used in battle
:   Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon.  If the wild Pokémon is water- or bug-type, this ball has a catch rate of 3×.  Otherwise, it has a catch rate of 1×.

    If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
effect_entries.short_effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Success rate is 3× for water and bug Pokémon.

effect_entries.effect:
Used in battle
:   Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon.  If the wild Pokémon was encountered by surfing or fishing, this ball has a catch rate of 3.5×.  Otherwise, it has a catch rate of 1×.

    If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
effect_entries.short_effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon. Success rate is 3.5× when underwater, fishing, or surfing.

effect_entries.effect:
Used in battle
:   Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon.  Has a catch rate of given by `(40 - level) / 10`, where `level` is the wild Pokémon’s level, to a maximum of 3.9× for level 1 Pokémon.  If the wild Pokémon’s level is higher than 30, this ball has a catch rate of 1×.

    If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
effect_entries.short_effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Success rate is 3.9× for level 1 Pokémon, and drops steadily to 1× at level 30.

effect_entries.effect:
Used in battle
:   Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon.  If the wild Pokémon’s species is marked as caught in the trainer’s Pokédex, this ball has a catch rate of 3×.  Otherwise, it has a catch rate of 1×.

    If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
effect_entries.short_effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Success rate is 3× for previously-caught Pokémon.

effect_entries.effect:
Used in battle
:   Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon.  Has a catch rate of 1.1× on the first turn of the battle and increases by 0.1× every turn, to a maximum of 4× on turn 30.

    If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
effect_entries.short_effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon. Success rate increases by 0.1× (Gen V: 0.3×) every turn, to a max of 4×.

effect_entries.effect:
Used in battle
:   Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon, using a catch rate of 1×.  Whenever the caught Pokémon’s happiness increases, it increases by one extra point.

    If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
effect_entries.short_effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Caught Pokémon start with 200 happiness.

effect_entries.effect:
Used in battle
:   Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon, using a catch rate of 1×.

    If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
effect_entries.short_effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.

Used on a friendly Pokémon
:   Restores 20 HP.
effect_entries.short_effect: Restores 20 HP.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Cures poison.
effect_entries.short_effect: Cures poison.

Used on a party Pokémon

effect_entries.short_effect: Cures a burn.

Used on a party Pokémon
:   Restores HP to full and cures any status ailment and confusion.
effect_entries.short_effect: Restores HP to full and cures any status ailment and confusion.

Used on a party Pokémon
:   Restores HP to full.
effect_entries.short_effect: Restores HP to full.

:   Restores 200 HP.
effect_entries.short_effect: Restores 200 HP.

Used on a party Pokémon
:   Cures any status ailment and confusion.
effect_entries.short_effect: Cures any status ailment and confusion.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Revives the Pokémon and restores half its HP.
effect_entries.short_effect: Revives with half HP.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Revives the Pokémon and restores its HP to full.
effect_entries.short_effect: Revives with full HP.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Restores 50 HP.
effect_entries.short_effect: Restores 50 HP.

Used on a party Pokémon
:   Restores 100 HP.
effect_entries.short_effect: Restores 100 HP.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Restores 50 HP.  Decreases happiness by 5/5/10.
effect_entries.short_effect: Restores 50 HP, but lowers happiness.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Restores 200 HP.  Decreases happiness by 10/10/15.
effect_entries.short_effect: Restores 200 HP, but lowers happiness.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Cures any status ailment.  Decreases happiness by 5/5/10.
effect_entries.short_effect: Cures any status ailment, but lowers happiness.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Revives a fainted Pokémon and restores its HP to full.  Decreases happiness by 10/10/15.
effect_entries.short_effect: Revives with full HP, but lowers happiness.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Restores 10 PP for a selected move.
effect_entries.short_effect: Restores 10 PP for one move.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Restores PP to full for a selected move.
effect_entries.short_effect: Restores PP to full for one move.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Restores 10 PP for each move.
effect_entries.short_effect: Restores 10 PP for each move.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Restores PP to full for each move.
effect_entries.short_effect: Restores PP to full for each move.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Cures any status ailment and confusion.
effect_entries.short_effect: Cures any status ailment and confusion.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Restores 20 HP.
effect_entries.short_effect: Restores 20 HP.

effect_entries.effect:
Used
:   Revives all fainted Pokémon in the party and restores their HP to full.
effect_entries.short_effect: Revives all fainted Pokémon with full HP.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Increases HP effort by 10, but won’t increase it beyond 100.  Increases happiness by 5/3/2.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises HP effort and happiness.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Increases Attack effort by 10, but won’t increase it beyond 100.  Increases happiness by 5/3/2.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises Attack effort and happiness.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Increases Defense effort by 10, but won’t increase it beyond 100.  Increases happiness by 5/3/2.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises Defense effort and happiness.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Increases Speed effort by 10, but won’t increase it beyond 100.  Increases happiness by 5/3/2.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises Speed effort and happiness.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Increases Special Attack effort by 10, but won’t increase it beyond 100.  Increases happiness by 5/3/2.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises Special Attack effort and happiness.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Increases level by 1.  Increases happiness by 5/3/2.
effect_entries.short_effect: Causes a level-up and raises happiness.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Increases a selected move’s max PP by 20% its original max PP, to a maximum of 1.6×.  Increases happiness by 5/3/2.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises a move’s max PP by 20%.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Increases Special Defense effort by 10, but won’t increase it beyond 100.  Increases happiness by 5/3/2.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises Special Defense and happiness.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Increases a selected move’s max PP to 1.6× its original max PP.  Increases happiness by 5/3/2.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises a move’s max PP by 60%.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon in battle
:   Protects the target’s stats from being lowered for the next five turns.  Increases happiness by 1/1/0.
effect_entries.short_effect: Prevents stat changes in battle for five turns in battle.  Raises happiness.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon in battle
:   Increases the target’s critical hit chance by one stage until it leaves the field.  Increases happiness by 1/1/0.
effect_entries.short_effect: Increases the chance of a critical hit in battle.  Raises happiness.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon in battle
:   Raises the target’s Attack by one stage.  Increases happiness by 1/1/0.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises Attack by one stage in battle.  Raises happiness.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon in battle
:   Raises the target’s Defense by one stage.  Increases happiness by 1/1/0.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises Defense by one stage in battle.  Raises happiness.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon in battle
:   Raises the target’s Speed by one stage.  Increases happiness by 1/1/0.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises Speed by one stage in battle.  Raises happiness.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon in battle
:   Raises the target’s accuracy by one stage.  Increases happiness by 1/1/0.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises accuracy by one stage in battle.  Raises happiness.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon in battle
:   Raises the target’s Special Attack by one stage.  Increases happiness by 1/1/0.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises Special Attack by one stage in battle.  Raises happiness.

effect_entries.effect:
Used in battle
:   Ends a wild battle.  Cannot be used in trainer battles.
effect_entries.short_effect: Ends a wild battle.

effect_entries.effect:
Used in battle
:   Ends a wild battle.  Cannot be used in trainer battles.
effect_entries.short_effect: Ends a wild battle.

Used on a party Pokémon

effect_entries.short_effect: Cures sleep.

:   Cures confusion.
effect_entries.short_effect: Cures confusion.

Used on a party Pokémon in battle

effect_entries.short_effect: Cures attraction.

effect_entries.effect:
Used outside of battle
:   Decreases the wild Pokémon encounter rate by 50%.
effect_entries.short_effect: Halves the wild Pokémon encounter rate.

effect_entries.effect:
Used outside of battle
:   Doubles the wild Pokémon encounter rate.
effect_entries.short_effect: Doubles the wild Pokémon encounter rate.

effect_entries.effect: No effect.
effect_entries.short_effect: No effect. Gen III: Trade four and four Shoal Shells for a Shell Bell.

effect_entries.effect: No effect.
effect_entries.short_effect: No effect. Gen III: Trade four and four Shoal Salts for a Shell Bell.

effect_entries.effect:
No effect.

In Diamond and Pearl, trade ten for a sunny day TM in the house midway along the southern section of sinnoh route 212.

In Platinum, trade to move tutors on sinnoh route 212, in snowpoint city, and in the survival area.  Eight shards total are required per tutelage, but the particular combination of colors varies by move.

In HeartGold and SoulSilver, trade one for a cheri berry, a leppa berry, and a pecha berry with the Juggler near the Pokémon Center in violet city.

In HeartGold and SoulSilver, trade one for a persim berry, a pomeg berry, and a razz berry with the Juggler near the pal park entrance in fuchsia city.
effect_entries.short_effect: No effect. Can be traded for items or moves.

effect_entries.effect:
No effect.

In Platinum, trade to move tutors on sinnoh route 212, in snowpoint city, and in the survival area.  Eight shards total are required per tutelage, but the particular combination of colors varies by move.

In HeartGold and SoulSilver, trade one for a chesto berry, an oran berry, and a wiki berry with the Juggler near the Pokémon Center in violet city.

In HeartGold and SoulSilver, trade one for a bluk berry, a cornn berry, and a kelpsy berry with the Juggler near the pal park entrance in fuchsia city.
effect_entries.short_effect: No effect. Can be traded for items or moves.

In HeartGold and SoulSilver, trade one for an aspear berry, a iapapa berry, and a sitrus berry with the Juggler near the Pokémon Center in violet city.

In HeartGold and SoulSilver, trade one for a grepa berry, a nomel berry, and a pinap berry with the Juggler near the pal park entrance in fuchsia city.

In Diamond and Pearl, trade ten for a hail TM in the house midway along the southern section of sinnoh route 212.

In Platinum, trade to move tutors on sinnoh route 212, in snowpoint city, and in the survival area.  Eight shards total are required per tutelage, but the particular combination of colors varies by move.

In HeartGold and SoulSilver, trade one for an aguav berry, a lum berry, and a rawst berry with the Juggler near the Pokémon Center in violet city.

effect_entries.effect:
Used outside of battle
:   Trainer will skip encounters with wild Pokémon of a lower level than the lead party Pokémon.  This effect wears off after the trainer takes 200 steps.
effect_entries.short_effect: For 200 steps, prevents wild encounters of level lower than your party’s lead Pokémon.

effect_entries.effect:
Used outside of battle
:   Trainer will skip encounters with wild Pokémon of a lower level than the lead party Pokémon.  This effect wears off after the trainer takes 250 steps.
effect_entries.short_effect: For 250 steps, prevents wild encounters of level lower than your party’s lead Pokémon.

effect_entries.effect:
Used outside of battle
:   Transports the trainer to the last-entered dungeon entrance.  Cannot be used outside, in buildings, or in distortion world, sinnoh hall of origin 1, spear pillar, or turnback cave.
effect_entries.short_effect: Transports user to the outside entrance of a cave.

effect_entries.effect:
Used outside of battle
:   Trainer will skip encounters with wild Pokémon of a lower level than the lead party Pokémon.  This effect wears off after the trainer takes 100 steps.
effect_entries.short_effect: For 100 steps, prevents wild encounters of level lower than your party’s lead Pokémon.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Evolves a cottonee into whimsicott, a gloom into bellossom, a petilil into lilligant, or a sunkern into sunflora.
effect_entries.short_effect: Evolves a Cottonee into Whimsicott, a Gloom into Bellossom, a Petilil into Lilligant, or a Sunkern into Sunflora.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Evolves a clefairy into clefable, a jigglypuff into wigglytuff, a munna into musharna, a nidorina into nidoqueen, a nidorino into nidoking, or a skitty into delcatty.
effect_entries.short_effect: Evolves a Clefairy into Clefable, a Jigglypuff into Wigglytuff, a Munna into Musharna, a Nidorina into Nidoqueen, a Nidorino into Nidoking, or a Skitty into Delcatty.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Evolves an eevee into flareon, a growlithe into arcanine, a pansear into simisear, or a vulpix into ninetales.
effect_entries.short_effect: Evolves an Eevee into Flareon, a Growlithe into Arcanine, a Pansear into Simisear, or a Vulpix into Ninetales.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Evolves an eelektrik into eelektross, an eevee into jolteon, or a pikachu into raichu.
effect_entries.short_effect: Evolves an Eelektrik into Eelektross, an Eevee into Jolteon, or a Pikachu into Raichu.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Evolves an eevee into vaporeon, a lombre into ludicolo, a panpour into simipour, a poliwhirl into poliwrath, a shellder into cloyster, or a staryu into starmie.
effect_entries.short_effect: Evolves an Eevee into Vaporeon, a Lombre into Ludicolo, a Panpour into Simipour, a Poliwhirl into Poliwrath, a Shellder into Cloyster, or a Staryu into Starmie.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Evolves an exeggcute into exeggutor, a gloom into vileplume, a nuzleaf into shiftry, a pansage into simisage, or a weepinbell into victreebel.
effect_entries.short_effect: Evolves an Exeggcute into Exeggutor, a Gloom into Vileplume, a Nuzleaf into Shiftry, a Pansage into Simisage, or a Weepinbell into Victreebel.

effect_entries.effect: Vendor trash.
effect_entries.short_effect: Fire Red and Leaf Green: Trade two for prior Level-up moves. Sell for 250 Pokédollars, or to Hungry Maid for 500 Pokédollars.

effect_entries.effect: Vendor trash.
effect_entries.short_effect: Fire Red and Leaf Green: Trade for prior Level-up moves. Sell for 2500 Pokédollars, or to Hungry Maid for 5000 Pokédollars.

effect_entries.effect: Vendor trash.
effect_entries.short_effect: Sell for 700 Pokédollars, or to Ore Collector for 1400 Pokédollars.

effect_entries.effect: Vendor trash.
effect_entries.short_effect: Sell for 3750 Pokédollars, or to Ore Collector for 7500 Pokédollars.

effect_entries.effect: Vendor trash.
effect_entries.short_effect: Sell for 1000 Pokédollars, or to Ore Collector for 2000 Pokédollars.

effect_entries.effect: Vendor trash.
effect_entries.short_effect: Platinum: Trade for one of each color Shard. Black and White: Trade for PP Up. Sell for 4900 Pokédollars, or to Ore Collector for 9800 Pokédollars.

effect_entries.effect: Vendor trash.
effect_entries.short_effect: Sell for 5000 Pokédollars, or to Ore Collector for 10000 Pokédollars.

effect_entries.effect: Trade one to the Move Relearner near the shore in pastoria city or with the Move Deleter in blackthorn city to teach one party Pokémon a prior level-up move.
effect_entries.short_effect: No effect. Can be traded for prior Level-up moves.

effect_entries.effect: Give to a scientist in the mining museum in oreburgh city or the Museum of Science in pewter city to receive a lileep.
effect_entries.short_effect: Can be revived into a Lileep.

effect_entries.effect: Give to a scientist in the mining museum in oreburgh city or the Museum of Science in pewter city to receive an anorith.
effect_entries.short_effect: Can be revived into an Anorith.

effect_entries.effect: Give to a scientist in the mining museum in oreburgh city or the Museum of Science in pewter city to receive an omanyte.
effect_entries.short_effect: Can be revived into an Omanyte.

effect_entries.effect: Give to a scientist in the mining museum in oreburgh city or the Museum of Science in pewter city to receive a kabuto.
effect_entries.short_effect: Can be revived into a Kabuto.

effect_entries.effect: Give to a scientist in the mining museum in oreburgh city or the Museum of Science in pewter city to receive an aerodactyl.
effect_entries.short_effect: Can be revived into an Aerodactyl.

effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   When the holder is paralyzed, it consumes this item to cure the paralysis.

Used on a party Pokémon
:   Cures paralysis.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Consumed when paralyzed to cure paralysis.

effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   When the holder is asleep, it consumes this item to wake up.

Used on a party Pokémon
:   Cures sleep.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Consumed when asleep to cure sleep.

effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   When the holder is poisoned, it consumes this item to cure the poison.

Used on a party Pokémon
:   Cures poison.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Consumed when poisoned to cure poison.

effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   When the holder is burned, it consumes this item to cure the burn.

Used on a party Pokémon
:   Cures a burn.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Consumed when burned to cure a burn.

effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   When the holder is frozen, it consumes this item to thaw itself.

Used on a party Pokémon
:   Cures freezing.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Consumed when frozen to cure frozen.

effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   When the holder is out of PP for one of its moves, it consumes this item to restore 10 of that move’s PP.

Used on a party Pokémon
:   Restores 10 PP for a selected move.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Consumed when a move runs out of PP to restore its PP by 10.

effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   When the holder has 1/2 its max HP remaining or less, it consumes this item to restore 10 HP.

Used on a party Pokémon
:   Restores 10 HP.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Consumed at 1/2 max HP to recover 10 HP.

effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   When the holder is confused, it consumes this item to cure the confusion.

Used on a party Pokémon
:   Cures confusion.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Consumed when confused to cure confusion.

effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   When the holder is afflicted with a major status ailment, it consumes this item to cure the ailment.

Used on a party Pokémon
:   Cures any major status ailment.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Consumed to cure any status condition or confusion.

effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   When the holder has 1/2 its max HP remaining or less, it consumes this item to restore 1/4 its max HP.

Used on a party Pokémon
:   Restores 1/4 the Pokémon’s max HP.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Consumed at 1/2 max HP to recover 1/4 max HP.

effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   When the holder has 1/2 its max HP remaining or less, it consumes this item to restore 1/8 its max HP.  If the holder dislikes spicy flavors (i.e., has a nature that lowers Attack), it will also become confused.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Consumed at 1/2 max HP to restore 1/8 max HP. Confuses Pokémon that dislike spicy flavor.

effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   When the holder has 1/2 its max HP remaining or less, it consumes this item to restore 1/8 its max HP.  If the holder dislikes dry flavors (i.e., has a nature that lowers Special Attack), it will also become confused.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Consumed at 1/2 max HP to restore 1/8 max HP. Confuses Pokémon that dislike dry flavor.

effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   When the holder has 1/2 its max HP remaining or less, it consumes this item to restore 1/8 its max HP.  If the holder dislikes sweet flavors (i.e., has a nature that lowers Speed), it will also become confused.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Consumed at 1/2 max HP to restore 1/8 max HP. Confuses Pokémon that dislike sweet flavor.

effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   When the holder has 1/2 its max HP remaining or less, it consumes this item to restore 1/8 its max HP.  If the holder dislikes bitter flavors (i.e., has a nature that lowers Special Defense), it will also become confused.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Consumed at 1/2 max HP to restore 1/8 max HP. Confuses Pokémon that dislike bitter flavor.

effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   When the holder has 1/2 its max HP remaining or less, it consumes this item to restore 1/8 its max HP.  If the holder dislikes sour flavors (i.e., has a nature that lowers Defense), it will also become confused.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Consumed at 1/2 max HP to restore 1/8 max HP. Confuses Pokémon that dislike sour flavor.

effect_entries.effect: No effect; only useful for planting and cooking.

Used on a party Pokémon
:   Increases happiness by 10/5/2.  Lowers HP effort by 10.

:   Increases happiness by 10/5/2.  Lowers Attack effort by 10.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Increases happiness by 10/5/2.  Lowers Special Attack effort by 10.
effect_entries.short_effect: Drops Special Attack Effort Values by 10 and raises happiness.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Increases happiness by 10/5/2.  Lowers Special Defense effort by 10.
effect_entries.short_effect: Drops Special Defense Effort Values by 10 and raises happiness.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Increases happiness by 10/5/2.  Lowers Speed effort by 10.
effect_entries.short_effect: Drops Speed Effort Values by 10 and raises happiness.

effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   When the holder has 1/4 its max HP remaining or less, it consumes this item to raise its Attack by one stage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Consumed at 1/4 max HP to boost Attack.

effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   When the holder has 1/4 its max HP remaining or less, it consumes this item to raise its Defense by one stage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Consumed at 1/4 max HP to boost Defense.

effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   When the holder has 1/4 its max HP remaining or less, it consumes this item to raise its Speed by one stage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Consumed at 1/4 max HP to boost Speed.

effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   When the holder has 1/4 its max HP remaining or less, it consumes this item to raise its Special Attack by one stage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Consumed at 1/4 max HP to boost Special Attack.

effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   When the holder has 1/4 its max HP remaining or less, it consumes this item to raise its Special Defense by one stage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Consumed at 1/4 max HP to boost Special Defense.

effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   When the holder has 1/4 its max HP remaining or less, it consumes this item to raise its critical hit chance by one stage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Consumed at 1/4 max HP to boost critical hit ratio by two stages.

effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   When the holder has 1/4 its max HP remaining or less, it consumes this item to raise a random stat by two stages.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Consumed at 1/4 max HP to boost a random stat by two stages.

effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   When the holder takes super-effective damage, it consumes this item to restore 1/4 its max HP.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Consumed when struck by a super-effective attack to restore 1/4 max HP.

effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   Moves targeting the holder have 0.9× chance to hit.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Increases the holder’s evasion by 1/9 (11 1/9%).

effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   At the end of each turn, if any of the holder’s stats have a negative stat modifier, the holder consumes this item to remove the modifiers from those stats.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Resets all lowered stats to normal at end of turn. Consumed after use.

effect_entries.effect:
Held
:   When the holder would gain effort due to battle, it gains double that effort instead.

Held in battle
:   Holder has half its Speed.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Holder gains double effort values from battles, but has halved Speed in battle.

effect_entries.effect:
Held
:   Experience is split across two groups: Pokémon who participated in battle, and Pokémon holding this item.  Each Pokémon earns experience as though it had battled alone, divided by the number of Pokémon in its group, then divided by the number of groups. Pokémon holding this item who also participated in battle effectively earn experience twice.

    Fainted Pokémon never earn experience, and empty groups are
ignored; thus, if a single Pokémon is holding this item and the only Pokémon who battled faints from explosion, the holder will gain full experience.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Half the experience from a battle is split between Pokémon holding this item.

effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   Whenever the holder attempts to use a move, it has a 3/16 chance to act first among moves with the same priority.  If multiple Pokémon have this effect at the same time, Speed is the tie-breaker as normal, but the effect of trick room is ignored.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Holder has a 3/16 (18.75%) chance to move first.

effect_entries.effect:
Held
:   When the holder would earn happiness for any reason, it earns twice that amount instead.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Doubles the happiness earned by the holder.

effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   When the holder is attracted, it consumes this item to cure the attraction.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Consumed to cure infatuation. Gen V: Also removes Taunt, Encore, Torment, Disable, and Cursed Body.

effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   Holder has 1.5× its Attack.  When the holder attempts to use a move, all its other moves are disabled until it leaves battle or loses this item.

    The restriction ends even if this item is swapped for another Choice item
via trick or switcheroo.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Increases Attack by 50%, but restricts the holder to only one move.

effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   Holder’s damaging moves have a 10% chance to make their target flinch.  This chance applies independently to each hit of a multi-hit move.

    This item’s chance is rolled independently of any other move effects;
e.g., a move with a 30% chance to flinch normally will have a 37% total chance to flinch when used with this item, because 3% of the time, both effects activate.

Held by poliwhirl or slowbro
:   Holder evolves into politoed or slowking, respectively, when traded.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Damaging moves gain a 10% chance to make their target flinch. Traded on a Poliwhirl: Holder evolves into Politoed. Traded on a Slowpoke: Holder evolves into Slowking.

effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   Holder’s bug-type moves have 1.2× their power.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Bug-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage.

effect_entries.effect:
Held
:   If the holder participated in a trainer battle, the trainer earns twice the usual prize money.  This effect applies even if the holder fainted.

    This effect does not stack with any other similar effect.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Doubles the money earned from a battle. Does not stack with Luck Incense.

effect_entries.effect: Held by lead Pokémon: Prevents wild battles with Pokémon that are lower level than the holder.
effect_entries.short_effect: Prevents wild encounters of level lower than your party’s lead Pokémon.

effect_entries.effect: Held by Latias or Latios: Increases the holder’s Special Attack and Special Defense by 50%.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises Latias and Latios’s Special Attack and Special Defense by 50%.

effect_entries.effect: Held by Clamperl: Doubles the holder’s Special Attack.  Evolves the holder into Huntail when traded.
effect_entries.short_effect: Doubles Clamperl’s Special Attack. Traded on a Clamperl: Holder evolves into Huntail.

effect_entries.effect: Held by Clamperl: Doubles the holder’s Special Defense.  Evolves the holder into Gorebyss when traded.
effect_entries.short_effect: Doubles Clamperl’s Special Defense. Traded on a Clamperl: Holder evolves into Gorebyss.

effect_entries.effect: Held: In wild battles, attempts to run away on the holder’s turn will always succeed.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Allows the Holder to escape from any wild battle.

effect_entries.effect: Held: Prevents the holder from evolving naturally.  Evolution initiated by the trainer (Stones, etc) will still work.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Prevents level-based evolution from occuring.

effect_entries.effect: Held: If the holder is attacked for regular damage that would faint it, this item has a 10% chance to prevent the holder’s HP from lowering below 1.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Holder has 10% chance to survive attacks or self-inflicted damage at 1 HP.

effect_entries.effect: Held: Increases any Exp the holder gains by 50%.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Increases EXP earned in battle by 50%.

effect_entries.effect: Held: Raises the holder’s critical hit counter by 1.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Raises the holder’s critical hit ratio by one stage.

effect_entries.effect:
Held: Increases the power of the holder’s Steel moves by 20%.
Held by Onix or Scyther: Evolves the holder into Steelix or Scizor when traded, respectively.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Steel-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage.

effect_entries.effect: Held: Heals the holder by 1/16 its max HP at the end of each turn.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Restores 1/16 (6.25%) holder’s max HP at the end of each turn.

effect_entries.effect: Held by Seadra: Evolves the holder into Kingdra when traded.
effect_entries.short_effect: Traded on a Seadra: Holder evolves into Kingdra.

effect_entries.effect: Held by Pikachu: Doubles the holder’s initial Attack and Special Attack.
effect_entries.short_effect: Doubles Pikachu’s Attack and Special Attack. Breed on Pikachu or Raichu: Pichu Egg will have Volt Tackle.

effect_entries.effect: Held: Increases the power of the holder’s Ground moves by 20%.

effect_entries.effect: Held: Increases the power of the holder’s Fire moves by 20%.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Fire-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage.

effect_entries.effect: Held by Porygon: Evolves the holder into Porygon2 when traded.
effect_entries.short_effect: Traded on a Porygon: Holder evolves into Porygon2.

effect_entries.effect: Held: Heals the holder by 1/8 of any damage it inflicts.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Holder receives 1/8 of the damage it deals when attacking.

effect_entries.effect: Held: Increases the power of the holder’s Water moves by 20%.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Water-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage. Breeding: Marill or Azumarill beget an Azurill Egg.

effect_entries.effect: Held: Increases the holder’s Evasion by 5%.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Holder’s evasion is increased by 5%. Breeding: Wobbuffet begets a Wynaut Egg.

effect_entries.effect: Held by Chansey: Raises the holder’s critical hit counter by 2.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises Chansey’s critical hit ratio by two stages.

effect_entries.effect: Held by Ditto: Increases the holder’s initial Defense and Special Defense by 50%.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises Ditto’s Defense and Special Defense by 50%. The boost is lost after transforming.

effect_entries.effect: Held by Cubone or Marowak: Doubles the holder’s Attack.
effect_entries.short_effect: Doubles Cubone or Marowak’s Attack.

effect_entries.effect: Held by Farfetch’d: Raises the holder’s critical hit counter by 2.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises Farfetch’d’s critical hit ratio by two stages.

effect_entries.effect: Displays a map of the region including the trainer’s position, location names, visited towns, gym locations, and where the trainer has been walking recently.
effect_entries.short_effect: Use to see the overworld map.

effect_entries.effect: Reveals trainers who want a rematch, by showing !! over their heads.  Each use drains the battery; requires 100 steps to charge.
effect_entries.short_effect: Allows rebattling of on-screen trainers. 100 steps to recharge.

effect_entries.effect: Contains the Coins used by the Game Corner, to a maximum of 50,000.
effect_entries.short_effect: Holds coins for the Game Corner.

effect_entries.effect: Used to find Pokémon on the Old Rod list for an area, which are generally Magikarp or similar.
effect_entries.short_effect: Used to catch Pokémon in bodies of water.

effect_entries.effect: Used to find Pokémon on the Good Rod list for an area, which are generally mediocre.
effect_entries.short_effect: Used to catch Pokémon in bodies of water.

effect_entries.effect: Used to find Pokémon on the Super Rod list for an area, which are generally the best available there.
effect_entries.short_effect: Used to catch Pokémon in bodies of water.

effect_entries.effect: Increases movement speed outside or in caves.  In high gear, allows the trainer to hop over some rocks and ascend muddy slopes.
effect_entries.short_effect: Use for fast transit.

effect_entries.effect:
Allows passage on a ferry.

The same item is used for different ferries between different games.
effect_entries.short_effect: Ticket for a ship. (RSE: S.S. Tidal LF: S.S. Anne HG: S.S. Aqua)

effect_entries.effect: Allows the trainer to enter Contests.
effect_entries.short_effect: Allows participation in Pokémon Contests.

effect_entries.effect: Grants access to the Team Galactic warehouse in Veilstone City.
effect_entries.short_effect: Grants access to the Team Galactic warehouse in Veilstone City.

effect_entries.effect:
Used by trainer in the Galactic Eterna Building, on the ground floor, to the left of the TV
:   Unlocks the secret rotom room, in which there are five appliances which can change Rotom’s form.
effect_entries.short_effect: Gen IV: The key to Rotom’s appliance room. Gen III: The key to Cinnabar Gym.

effect_entries.effect:
Used by trainer outside of battle
:   Searches for hidden items.
effect_entries.short_effect: Use to find hidden items on the field. AKA Itemfinder.

effect_entries.effect: Causes groudon to appear in the embedded tower.
effect_entries.short_effect: Summons Groudon to the Embedded Tower.

effect_entries.effect: Causes kyogre to appear in the embedded tower.
effect_entries.short_effect: Summons Kyogre to the Embedded Tower.

effect_entries.effect:
Used by trainer outside of battle
:   Opens doors in the goldenrod city Radio Tower.
effect_entries.short_effect: HS: Opens doors in the Radio Tower. Gen III: Unlocks Silph Co Doors.

effect_entries.effect:
Used by trainer outside of battle
:   Opens the door to the basement tunnel under goldenrod city.
effect_entries.short_effect: HS: Key to the tunnel under Goldenrod City. Gen III: Key to New Mauville.

effect_entries.effect:
Used to send short messages to other players via Pokémon trading.  Trainer may compose a message from a finite list of words when giving this item to a Pokémon.  Once taken and read, a message may be erased and this item can be reused, or the message may be stored in the trainer’s PC.

Held
:   Holder cannot be placed in the PC.  Any move attempting to remove this item from the holder will fail.
effect_entries.short_effect: Lets a Trainer write a message and send it via Pokémon trade.

effect_entries.effect:
Used to send short messages to other players via Pokémon trading.  Trainer may compose a message from a finite list of words when giving this item to a Pokémon.  Once taken and read, a message may be erased and this item can be reused, or the message may be stored in the trainer’s PC.

Held
:   Holder cannot be placed in the PC.  Any move attempting to remove this item from the holder will fail.
effect_entries.short_effect: Lets a Trainer write a message and send it via Pokémon trade.

effect_entries.effect: Increases movement speed outside or in caves.  Faster than the acro bike.  Allows the trainer to ascend muddy slopes.
effect_entries.short_effect: Faster than the Acro Bike, and can ride up sandy slopes and across cracked floors.

effect_entries.effect: Increases movement speed outside or in caves.  Slower than the mach bike.  Can perform various tricks, allowing the trainer to reach certain special areas.
effect_entries.short_effect: More maneuverable than the Mach Bike, and allows hopping along rails.

effect_entries.effect: Waters Berry plants.
effect_entries.short_effect: Used to water berries.

effect_entries.effect: Contains a machine part to be delivered to Captain Stern.
effect_entries.short_effect: Contains mechanical parts to be delivered to Captain Stern.

effect_entries.effect: Collects soot when walking through tall grass on hoenn route 113.
effect_entries.short_effect: Stores volcanic ash from Route 113.

effect_entries.effect: Stores Pokéblocks.
effect_entries.short_effect: Holds Pokéblocks.

effect_entries.effect: Contains a letter to be delivered to Steven.
effect_entries.short_effect: A letter to Steven from the Devon Corp president.

effect_entries.effect: Provides access to southern island and either latias or latios, whichever is not available roaming around Hoenn.
effect_entries.short_effect: Provides access to Southern Island and Latias or Latios.

effect_entries.effect: May be traded to Captain Stern for a deep sea tooth or a deep sea scale.
effect_entries.short_effect: Trade to Captain Stern for a DeepSeaTooth or DeepSeaScale.

effect_entries.effect: Allows the trainer to enter the desert on hoenn route 111.
effect_entries.short_effect: Allows passage through windy deserts.

effect_entries.effect:
RSE: May be traded to Professor Cozmo for tm27.

FRLG: A meteorite to be delivered to Lostelle’s father.
effect_entries.short_effect: FL: Deliver to Lostelle’s father. RSE: Trade to Professor Cozmo for TM27 (Return).

effect_entries.effect: Unlocks room 1 on the abandoned ship.
effect_entries.short_effect: Unlocks room 1 on the Abandoned Ship.

effect_entries.effect: Unlocks room 2 on the abandoned ship.
effect_entries.short_effect: Unlocks room 2 on the Abandoned Ship.

effect_entries.effect: Unlocks room 4 on the abandoned ship.
effect_entries.short_effect: Unlocks room 4 on the Abandoned Ship.

effect_entries.effect: Unlocks room 6 on the abandoned ship.
effect_entries.short_effect: Unlocks room 6 on the Abandoned Ship.

effect_entries.effect: Reveals invisble kecleon on the overworld.
effect_entries.short_effect: Allows spotting of invisible Kecleon.

effect_entries.effect: A parcel to be delivered to Professor Oak for a Pokédex.
effect_entries.short_effect: Trade to Prof. Oak for a Pokédex.

effect_entries.effect: Wakes up sleeping Pokémon.  Required to wake up sleeping snorlax on the overworld.
effect_entries.short_effect: Use to awaken sleeping Pokémon, including Snorlax on roads.

effect_entries.effect: May be traded for a bicycle.
effect_entries.short_effect: Trade in Cerulean bike shop for a Bicycle.

effect_entries.effect: The Safari Zone warden’s teeth, to be returned to him for hm04.
effect_entries.short_effect: The Safari Zone Warden’s dentures. Trade for HM04 (Strength).

effect_entries.effect: Operates the elevator in the Celadon Rocket Hideout.
effect_entries.short_effect: Operates the elevator in Team Rocket’s Celadon Hideout.

effect_entries.effect: Identifies ghosts in pokemon tower.
effect_entries.short_effect: Used to identify the true forms of ghosts in Pokémon Tower.

effect_entries.effect: Records information on various famous people.
effect_entries.short_effect: Records information about NPCs.

effect_entries.effect: Stores TMs and HMs.
effect_entries.short_effect: Holds TMs.

effect_entries.effect: Stores Berries.
effect_entries.short_effect: Holds berries.

effect_entries.effect: Teaches beginning trainers basic information.
effect_entries.short_effect: Teachers basic trainer advice.

effect_entries.effect: Provides access to the first three Sevii Islands.
effect_entries.short_effect: Grants access to the first three Sevii Islands.

effect_entries.effect: Provides access to the Sevii Islands.
effect_entries.short_effect: Grants access to all of the Sevii Islands.

effect_entries.effect: Used to bribe the saffron city guards for entry to the city.
effect_entries.short_effect: Grants access to Saffron City.

effect_entries.effect: Provides access to Navel Rock, ho oh, and lugia.
effect_entries.short_effect: Allows access to Navel Rock and Lugia or Ho-oh.

effect_entries.effect: Provides access to Birth Island and deoxys.
effect_entries.short_effect: Allows access to Birth Island and Deoxys.

effect_entries.effect: Holds Berry Powder from Berry Crushing.
effect_entries.short_effect: Stores Berry Powder made using a Berry Crusher.

effect_entries.effect: Deliver to Celio for use in the Network Machine.
effect_entries.short_effect: Give to Celio with Sapphire to activate Network Machine and get Rainbow Pass.

effect_entries.effect: Deliver to Celio for use in the Network Machine.
effect_entries.short_effect: Give to Celio with Ruby to activate Network Machine and get Rainbow Pass.

effect_entries.effect: Provides access to the magma hideout in the jagged pass.
effect_entries.short_effect: Provides access to the Team Magma Hideout in the Jagged Pass.

effect_entries.effect: Provides access to Faraway Island and mew.
effect_entries.short_effect: Allows access to Faraway Island and Mew. Unreleased outside of Japan.
